## Image\_2.tile() method

Describes an image as a tile within a larger image atlas file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static tile(url: string, rows: number, cols: number, row: number, col: number): ImageView;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | URL of the source image atlas file. |
|  rows | number | How many rows of images are in the atlas. |
|  cols | number | How many columns of images are in the atlas. |
|  row | number | Row index of the tile, 0 is the ???-most. |
|  col | number | Column index of the tile, 0 is the left-most. |

**Returns:**

[ImageView](./bge-core.imageview.md)

Display information used when drawing an image.
